title: Demoted after 1 game?
body:
Hey,

So I'm plat and 1 or 2 days ago i was on my promotions to go up to plat 3, but had same bad games and I went down to 0 points on plat 4. Then I lost 1 game and went down to plat 5. I thought you had to lose 3 ranked games on 0 points to get demoted to a lower division. 

Am I wrong or is that only for gold, silver, and bronze?

replies.body: There's not limit or number of games set to when you can get demoted, unless you have a [Shield ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h6)which only occurs after a promotion.  Looking into this for you, I wasn't able to see anything out of the ordinary here.  Still, you still have lots of time and I wish you all the best in your ranked games!
